MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G71 postcode area of Uddingston. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:05am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working to repair a damaged overhead jumper cable affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:40pm on Monday, 8th February 2021
